question:
Consider the following statements about the Innovation in Science Pursuit for Inspired Research (INSPIRE):
  1. It is a scholarship programme that aims to motivate young talents for the study of Science & Technology and pursue research as their career
  2. The programme provides scholarships to students within top 1% of their Class XII examination merit list of any state or central board
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u> because Innovation in Science Pursuit for Inspired Research (INSPIRE) is a scholarship programme that aims to motivate young talents for the study of science & technology and pursue research as a career. <u>Second statement is also correct</u> because as per the scheme, the Department of Science & Technology will provide scholarships to students with aggregate marks within top 1% of their class XII examination merit list of any state and central board in India. In addition, the student must be pursuing courses in Natural and Basic Sciences at the BSc, BS, and Int. MSc/MS level. Selected candidates are supported for a maximum period of five years, starting from the 1st year BSc, BS, Int. MSc/Int.MS or until the completion of the course, whichever is earlier.
